title: Prevail
description: Book 2 of The Pike Chronicles  A battle weary Captain fighting for redemption. An impossible search for a scattered crew. Marines pushed beyond their limits. A heinous alien race bent on annihilation.  When all is lost, a brave few dare to hope, and continue to fight for freedom. Do they struggle in vain? Or will they prevail?  Prevail is a 72,000 word space opera, and is Book 2 of The Pike Chronicles.  As a matter of principle, this book is DRM free.
author: G.P. Hudson
